paper_abstract: Some aspects in the implementation of a turbulence model revealed critical for the correct prediction of the flow characteristics in the case of a low Reynolds number flow (10(4)-10(5)) around an airfoil. In particular the treatment of the transition point setting strongly influenced the computed solution. This effect was not found in case of high Reynolds number. (C) 2014 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the implementation of a turbulence model for low Reynolds number flows
